attributes.action: Create provision in planning system for the creation of Eco Villages on greenfield land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Provision needs to be made for the creation low impact, sustainable Eco-Villages on rural greenfield sites if we are to meet current housing needs, promote social mobility and meet vital carbon reduction targets.

People who want to live and work the land using low impact, sustainable means, cannot afford the housing in rural areas of Britian and yet are disbarred from being able to create affordable land based enterprises that contribute to the land, as opposed to traditional housing developments.
